name: Blockwars
description:
A delightful platform shooter game for all ages, challenge your friends in this mind-boggling game that features mind-boggling, frantic gameplay, choose from 8 amazing characters, challenge up to 4 friends in this didinamic and adorable local multiplayer game, beat your friends in all 8 arenas available, try to be the last player alive, collect wins and be the first in the ranking.

The game will receive updates with more weapons, players and levels.

TO PLAY BLOCKWARS, YOU NEED AT LEAST 2 JOYSTICKS

Blockwars is also available for XBox One on Xbox Live Store
